mapper.select: SELECT id, parentId, postId, content, userid, TO_CHAR(createdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdate, repIndent FROM comments WHERE postId = #{postId} ORDER BY parentId ASC, createdate ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (id, parentId, postId, content, userid, createdate, repIndent) VALUES (#{id}, #{parentId}, #{postId}, #{content}, #{userid}, SYSDATE, #{repIndent})
